definition: ancient bronze wine holder with 3 legs and loop handle/nobility
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: One of my all-time favorite jazz pianists is Thelonious Monk.
sentences.chinese: 瑟隆尼亞斯孟克是我其中一個最愛的爵士樂鋼琴家。

sentences.english: It is certainly much more than mere background music.
sentences.chinese: 爵士樂絕不僅僅只是背景音樂。

sentences.english: Ragtime also influenced the creation of jazz.
sentences.chinese: 拉格泰姆音樂也影響了爵士樂的形成。

sentences.english: Three years earlier, she was the first-ever vocalist admitted to the Thelonious Monk Institute of Jazz Performance.
sentences.chinese: 三年前，她是第一次住進了歌手蒙克爵士樂學院性能。

sentences.english: The song has a syncopated rhythm in the jazz version.
sentences.chinese: 這首歌曲改編爲爵士樂後接納了切分音節拍。
你喜歡迪克西蘭爵士樂嗎？

sentences.english: Dixieland jazz is red hot and popular with many people.
sentences.chinese: 迪克西蘭爵士樂是非常受歡迎的火爆音樂。

sentences.english: I play bass-guitar too, but mainly use the double bass when I play jazz.
sentences.chinese: 我彈爵士樂時主要用的就是那把低音提琴。

sentences.english: Jazz seems to be a virgin territory in Mandopop.
sentences.chinese: 爵士樂好象在華人嬉哈里還是塊處女地。

sentences.english: Something a bit classy yet jazzy and funky.
sentences.chinese: 但有一點東西優雅爵士樂和時髦。

sentences.english: A swing sound that would change jazz was about to be born.
sentences.chinese: 一個即將改變爵士樂的搖擺聲音即將誕生。

sentences.english: Musicians blast their brassy jazz from street corners.
sentences.chinese: 玩音樂的人在街角大聲彈奏起尖銳刺耳的爵士樂。

sentences.english: I love jazz and opera. And also hip-hop.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡爵士樂和歌劇，還有嘻哈音樂。

sentences.english: Steven： Only because of the roots of jazz?
sentences.chinese: 只是因爲這是爵士樂的起源？

sentences.english: My schedule now is still filled with jazz.
sentences.chinese: 現在我的日程安排裏排滿了與爵士樂相關的活動。

sentences.english: At the end of the song there is an impressive guitar jazz band jam.
sentences.chinese: 在結尾部分有一段精彩的“吉他爵士樂隊演出”。
